string.text: Any jobs?
Hmm, what kind of jobs? Something special you are looking for? Or maybe you already found something? I've heard this area is full of goodies.
Sorry I cannot chat, no time.
Right, you just cannot wait to get going again. Aren't you tired of running around? You must have found something by now?
What I found is my business.
Documents found in X-18. Barkeep promised good pay for them.
No I did not find anything.
I sort of drifted here and cannot wait to get the hell out of here.
Anything of interest found by chance? They say you can find information about experiments. For good paid too.
No, I did not find anything.
Yeah? And if you think real hard? Hiding something from me?
No!
What kind of question is that?
You threatening me?
To hell with all this information. I've barely stayed alive.
Well run away then. Sooner or later you will find that I'm needed.

Listen buddy I have been traveling the Zone for a long time through fire, monsters, anomalies, and I am still alive as you can see! So do not challenge me. I came for documents and without them I will not go away. If you have them then I advise you to give them up otherwise you will remain in this pit forever! Capisce?!
Clearly!

If you're lying to me you will have a problem, and if you have something planned you will have a problem, and if you give me any crap you will have a problem. Simply put, you have one big problem, me! And you better try harder to solve it! And now once more to be blunt: did you find the documents?
That's good and next time choose a better expression. Go on now. Suddenly you find that I'm needed.
The conversation is over, get out of the way.
I have no documents!
That's better my friend. And now give me all the documents. Every single document. And do not try to joke with me otherwise it will be your last joke.
Wait, I tell you! I fell in the hole and found them. Do not play me like a fool. Share, if ...
I do not intend to share.
Well, well, well ... yeah here's a piece of advice: 'watch where you walk and do not stumble stalker'.
You're threatening me?
Okay, okay don't get mad. Just curious, but you're right when behind a weapon! No more questioning. Just be careful, that's all.
Documents, that's exactly what I came for, for information. And now you tell me you might have given them away. Do you understand I need them?
Come on, say something.
Listen buddy do not fool with me. Lets come to an agreement. I normally help stalkers, you will not regret.
Listen I really need these documents. Let's see, what have you ... I think we'll agree.
Dark here, a damn sight. Burers all around. And why did I agree? Do you like it here?
Go on your way, stalker.

I hate it when the conversation is interrupted. In short, I have come for important documents. If you know something then out with it, otherwise you will have problems. If you don't then get out and do not waste my time.
I hate it when the conversation is interrupted! Give up the documents if you do not want to stay here forever.
I will consider.
